name: exintrbi
params: setvar s0, wff w0, wff w1
body: |- wi(wal(s0, wi(w0, w1)), wb(wex(s0, w0), wex(s0, wa(w0, w1))))

stmt.origin: alexbii(s0, wi(w0, w1), w0, wa(w0, w1))

body.origin:
|- wi(wal(s0, wi(w0, w1)), wb(wex(s0, w0), wex(s0, wa(w0, w1))))
-| wi(wi(w0, w1), wb(w0, wa(w0, w1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wal(s0, wi(w0, w1)), wb(wex(s0, w0), wex(s0, wa(w0, w1))))
-| wi(wi(w0, w1), wb(w0, wa(w0, w1)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wi(w0, w1), wb(w0, wa(w0, w1)))
-| wb(wa(w0, w1), wa(w0, wi(w0, w1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wal(s0, wi(w0, w1)), wb(wex(s0, w0), wex(s0, wa(w0, w1))))
-| wb(wa(w0, w1), wa(w0, wi(w0, w1)))
|- wi(wal(s0, wi(w0, w1)), wb(wex(s0, w0), wex(s0, wa(w0, w1))))

comment: Add/remove a conjunct in the scope of an existential quantifier. (Contributed by Raph Levien, 3-Jul-2006.)
